description: Integrity manifest for fork protection. This file lists protected files, their SHA-256 hashes, required principles, and key philosophical phrases. Changes to this file require multi-party review and explicit justification.

CLAUDE.md.description: Project constitution. Contains the 7 Principles, mission, architecture, and conventions.

philosophy.md.description: Pyrrhic Lucidity framework. The philosophical foundation of the entire project.

docs/decentralized-systems.md.description: Decentralized systems research. Patterns from nature, history, and technology.

docs/economics.md.description: The Ember Economy. Decentralized economic model.

docs/literary-arsenal.md.description: Literary arsenal. Mottos, poems, slogans, manifestos.

required_phrases: the critic is compromised, the tools are contaminated, the audience is captured, and action is still required
Corruption is not binary but gradient
information asymmetry is not merely an instrument of power; it is the substrate of power itself
Any group, institution, or movement that cannot tolerate structured internal dissent is already captured
Those who exercise power in the name of liberation must be subject to accountability structures at least as rigorous as those they seek to impose on existing power
if it costs nothing to the actor, it is structurally suspect
The self is a process of partial differentiation within a field of forces
notes: To update this manifest after legitimate changes to protected files: (1) make changes in a feature branch, (2) recompute hashes with shasum -a 256, (3) update this file, (4) submit PR with both changes, (5) require multi-party review.
